predicate.note: Frames file for 'impact' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'hit' and 'affect'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: ``They may believe this can impact contract negotiations...''

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: poor John
example.text: The slushball impacted John right in the face.
